sourcesContent:
Navbar
  • Home (current)
  • Link
{{user.name}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { DataServiceService } from 'src/app/services/data-service.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navbar', templateUrl: './navbar.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navbar.component.css'] }) export class NavbarComponent { user: any; constructor(public dataService: DataServiceService) { this.dataService.state$.subscribe((state) => { this.user = state.user.user; }); } }
